mksourcedir

chezmoi managed
cmpenv stdout golden/managed

chezmoi managed --include=all
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-all

chezmoi managed --include=absent
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-absent

chezmoi managed --include=dirs
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-dirs

chezmoi managed --include=files
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-files

chezmoi managed --include=symlinks
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-symlinks

-- golden/managed --
$HOMESLASH/.dir
$HOMESLASH/.dir/file
$HOMESLASH/.dir/subdir
$HOMESLASH/.dir/subdir/file
$HOMESLASH/.empty
$HOMESLASH/.executable
$HOMESLASH/.exists
$HOMESLASH/.file
$HOMESLASH/.private
$HOMESLASH/.symlink
$HOMESLASH/.template
-- golden/managed-all --
$HOMESLASH/.absent
$HOMESLASH/.dir
$HOMESLASH/.dir/file
$HOMESLASH/.dir/subdir
$HOMESLASH/.dir/subdir/file
$HOMESLASH/.empty
$HOMESLASH/.executable
$HOMESLASH/.exists
$HOMESLASH/.file
$HOMESLASH/.private
$HOMESLASH/.symlink
$HOMESLASH/.template
-- golden/managed-absent --
$HOMESLASH/.absent
-- golden/managed-dirs --
$HOMESLASH/.dir
$HOMESLASH/.dir/subdir
-- golden/managed-files --
$HOMESLASH/.dir/file
$HOMESLASH/.dir/subdir/file
$HOMESLASH/.empty
$HOMESLASH/.executable
$HOMESLASH/.exists
$HOMESLASH/.file
$HOMESLASH/.private
$HOMESLASH/.template
-- golden/managed-symlinks --
$HOMESLASH/.symlink
